transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_004357.4 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000397420.8. The two transcripts differ at the 5'UTR.

contact.name: Jill Storry
contact.address: Department of Laboratory Medicine, Division of Hematology and Transfusion Medicine, Lund University, Sweden
